collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us:

items.account: Account Information: Email address, name, and password
items.profile: Profile Data: Age, weight, height, activity level, and nutritional goals
items.usage: Usage Data: Food photos, meal logs, and nutrition tracking data
items.payment: Payment Information: Processed securely by Paddle (we don't store card details)

items.service: Provide and improve our nutrition tracking service
items.analytics: Analyze usage to improve our AI models

storage.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely on servers hosted by Fly.io. We implement industry-standard security measures including:

sharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with:

items.paddle: Paddle: Our payment processor (Merchant of Record)
items.huggingface: Hugging Face: For AI model inference (anonymized food images)
items.legal: Law enforcement: When required by law

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and session management. We do not use third-party tracking cookies for advertising purposes.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. After account deletion, we may retain anonymized data for analytics purposes. Payment records are retained as required by law.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: NutriProfile is not intended for children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

international.title: 9. International Transfers
international.content: Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international data transfers.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the service.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
